parameters.name: metastore_id
parameters.description: (string) The ID for the metastore in which the system schema resides.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of schemas to return.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

200.description: The schemas list was successfully retrieved.

get.description: Gets an array of system schemas for a metastore. The caller must be an account admin or a metastore admin.
